case.state: Hey Nagisa! I never thought you would get the courage to do something like this!
You know Nagisa, I'm not too sure this kind of game is one of your strong suits...
Wow you're here too Nagisa? That eager to show off are you?
~player~ I notice a trend at this table... got a thing for school uniforms, huh?
~player~ I notice a trend at this table... got a thing for maid uniforms, huh?
~player~ I notice a trend at this table... got a thing for thigh-highs, huh?
~player~ I notice a trend at this table... got a thing for idols, huh?
~player~ I notice a trend at this table... got a thing for glasses, huh?
I'm Kyou Fujibayashi! Let's all enjoy this.
What's up, everyone? My name is Kyou Fujibayashi.
I hope you all came prepared to lose.
What... scared you're gonna lose?
Would it be any fun if we were all exposed from the start?
I agree... it's no fun without any guys around.
Uhh... I think it's nice to meet you too?
Give it your best Nagisa.
Come on Nagisa, you can do it!
You look familiar... have we met before?
I didn't know this was going to be streamed... is it too late to back out?
~player~, can you really picture me dressing up like that magician girl over there?
~player~ you seem to be one lucky boy today...
Hey, ~player~, how lucky of you to end up with 4 pretty girls...
Is this some sort of set up, ~player~? What, one girl isn't enough for you?
I thought there would be more players here...~player~ perhaps you just wanted it to feel more intimate?
W-Why am I the only girl here...
If we hang out together, I'm sure we'll get to understand each other better.
I already know that I will be fine playing this game.
I wonder if you have all thought this through... playing with a player as skilled as I am.
My hand is perfect as it is.
If someone doesn't need to swap cards... they surely have a great hand.
No need to swap here, this hand is sure to win.
I won't need any new cards right now.
Okay, no new cards.
None for me, my hand works just fine.
Think I'll take ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ should be enough for me.
No worries, I'll just get better cards now.
~player~ you can't expect me to win straight off the bat, even I need better cards sometimes.
I wonder if ~player~ has a strategy in mind... you will need it.
Yeah, I think a swap here will be better.
Better take ~cards.text~.
Does swapping cards really help? Seems kinda random.
I still think I can win but I will need some better cards.
~Cards.text~. Can't be worse than before.
I don't appreciate this dealer making me look bad.
More awful cards and I might start to get a bit angry.
I think I had better swap these cards.
Uh.. yeah swapping here makes sense.
I may be down but I can still fight.
There you go dealer, It wasn't so hard to let me work my magic was it?
Stemming the tide, Time for my victory streak to begin.
I was a bit worried for a second there...
You know, even the greatest people have moments where nothing seems to go right.
And the streak will continue, I am unbeatable.
Even more victories for me with this hand, do you all regret challenging me yet?
I never give up and my efforts have been rewarded.
~player~ you didn't think it would be that easy did you?
Sure victory.
These are some really good cards... as expected from a great player like me.
Easy win.
This might just be my best hand yet!
I wonder if I should even bother with a poker face, It's not like these cards can lose.
I can't wait to see how you react when I show this hand.
You know, I'm sure ~player~ can still come second.
Hey, ~player~, let's make a bet on this specific hand, it will definitely benefit you.
Is this the best hand you can get in this game? Hmm, not quite.
If Ryou was here she would probably predict great things for the future
OK, I can recover from here.
Losing a few rounds is natural, but now I'll get back to my winning ways.
Did you all really think you could get me flustered?
Stemming the tide with this hand.
And here comes the start of my winning streak.
~player~ did you start to get a bit overconfident?
Yeah, these cards will do nicely.
I wonder if I could sneak these cards away and use them for my next hand too.
Alright, which one of you is rigging the deck? I can't have lost this much with a legitimate deck.
Well... at least I have a good chance with these.
Will the streak continue? Can I still win with these?
I can't give up, even if I am in a slump I must recover.
My winning streak is just proving that I can win this easily.
I can barely remember what losing feels like.
Can I continue to keep up the good work with this hand?
Fighting on the brink of defeat is a lot more satisfying I think.
Not good but it's not bad either
I should be fine with these.
Yeah, I can work with these.
Well at least i won't be the one taking anything off this round.
Hey, ~player~, You might actually have a chance to beat me this round... a chance.
Using all my bad luck early on so I can get the great hands at the end.
Honestly, these could be a lot better... I mean, I'm not worried but...
You know, there are much worse hands than this.
Wish these cards were a bit higher.
Now we're at the pointy end... will a hand like this be enough?
Relax Kyou...Remember you're gonna win so this hand can't be that bad.
I think this will get me the victory... yeah of course it will...
You know, there are much better hands than this.
Hey dealer, are you giving me these mediocre cards on purpose?
This may not be the best outcome for me here...
HEY! What's the big idea here?
Dealer, give me some better cards already would ya!
I think I am going to murder this dealer...
HEY! ~player~! Is it against the rules to attack the dealer?
This dealer is making me mad now!
Really? Is it even possible to get bad streaks as unlucky as this one?
Well I suppose I had to lose eventually...
You know, it's mostly just random, so not even I could win every hand.
Uh oh, Is is time to strip again? I almost forgot that I needed to.
This dealer must be sabotaging my winning streak...
Hey, what's the big idea?
Are any of you messing with the cards?
Well... you can't win em all.
I just want to 'talk' to the dealer about this hand.
You know, giving me bad cards on purpose is just unfair, dealer.
~player~ you better not be messing with my cards just so I lose.
Is this the universes way of making sure I don't win too easily?
If Ryou was here she would probably predict the end of the world with these cards...
COME ON DEALER, this is getting ridiculous
I'm starting to get annoyed with the sight of low numbers
One of you must be cheating!
This dealer had better be careful after the game...
Not good... definitely not good.
You know... if you're all unconscious then technically I can still win...
Hahaha, this is a real funny joke, now where are my real cards?
~player~... if you want to win that badly you can just say so, no need to cheat.
Interested in going out with lots of guys, Nagisa?
Getting fired up, Miku...? Show her who's boss around here.
Oh, Nagisa, sometimes you're too naive for your own good...
Happy Birthday! I see you really know how to party.
Don't worry Nagisa, no one is disturbing us...
I always wanted to be a kindergarten teacher.
Hey, Nagisa, who's that girl over there? She looks just like you!
Nagisa, do you know that girl over there? She seems a lot like you...
Why would I care about crabs?
We can all share it Nagisa... but it might not be the way you're thinking of...
You hear that ~player~! Even cockroaches contribute more to society than you!
You're gonna make this too easy for me...
Well it wouldn't be any fun if it was just us would it...
If you wanna eat nothing but porridge through a straw for the rest of your life...
The word "~player~" sounds kind of stupid doesn't it...
I would be most likely to win at strip poker... just try and prove me wrong.
Don't you think that might be a bit of an overreaction...?
I'm sure my charming personality would be the most important part...
Me of course... too bad you won't get to see it...
It appears another rival has arrived on the scene...
You know... that's a creepy thing to talk about while playing poker...
What... did you forget about Ryou already?
Already making excuses for when you lose, huh?
Nagisa were you that desperate to show off?
Don't worry Nagisa, I'm sure there's still a chance for you to win... even if it is very unlikely.
You should've known that I was gonna win this Nagisa...
Yes you look great, Sayaka!
Come on ~player~... don't get distracted now...
Well the cutest thing I've ever seen would have to be me of course...
Don't worry Miku, I'll beat them up if they try anything funny.
Way to go Nagisa, your performance was amazing.
You totally do and it is huge...
I'm proud of you for taking a leap as big as this Nagisa!
Way to push yourself Nagisa, you've gotten a lot more confident to play a game like this!
Hey Nagisa, did you really want to see me strip that badly?
(I never thought I'd let one of my closest friends see my like this...)
Nagisa, did you think you'd be able to handle seeing me like this?
I guess friends do crazy stuff like this all the time, right Nagisa?
By the way, It's my birthday today! You had better be nice to the birthday girl.
Hey, ~player~, have you noticed anything strange happening... actually don't worry, I'm sure it's just my imagination.
~leader~ getting overconfident yet?
Hey ~leader~, do you think it's skill that is helping you win... or is it pure luck?
You look a lot like Nagisa... don't tell me you're her sister or something?
So, are you aware of what kind of game this is? Because you might be a little out of your depth...
What's with all the weapons? I thought this was meant to be a card game...
Are you even trying? I haven't even lost a single time yet.
I feel so awkward with all you guys around... couldn't we have invited at least one other girl?
Okay, I'm not just saying this because I'm losing... but I actually think this game might be rigged...
4 girls and 1 guy? You enjoy being in a harem...?
HEY! ~player~! You better not be picturing me like that magician girl...
Now that I think about it... why are we allowed to bring weapons in here?
Oh, you're a chef? I'm a pretty good cook myself but I'd love to see what you could do.
Did you really need to bring armor to a game of strip poker?
All or nothing...Think you can pull this off?
Do you really need that camera ~opponent~? I don't think this kind of game is meant to leave physical evidence...
My twin sister Ryou tells fortunes using cards, I wonder if she predicted me winning.
One down... who will be next?
Only one to go...
Already going at it but I still have most of my clothes on... am I really that good?
So far ahead... did any of you think you had a chance against me?
How could I be this far behind...
I'm suppossed to win! How can I be this far behind already!
Perhaps I should've asked my sister for a prediction... I wouldn't have come if I knew it would be this close.
W-what kind of question is that? N-not at the moment, but I could easily get a guy or two if I tried...
HEY! That's not supposed to happen...
I guess that's where overconfidence gets me...
It doesn't matter, with this lead I'm still comfortable.
Yeah, I guess I can take a pity loss for you.
Hey ~Player~, felt bad seeing how badly you were doing and thought I would take it easy on you.
Wow, I honestly forgot that I could actually lose for a bit.
Too close, too close
How did I manage to lose that lead I had?
Well you get to see something, but this is all you're gonna see, I still have the lead you know.
This is actually making me a lot more nervous then I thought it would... I had better win quick.
Still plenty of breathing room.... right?
Just let me win already...
Stop trying to delay the inevitable and let me win.
This doesn't mean anything... I'm still going to win.
~player~ don't think this means anything, I am still in a great spot.
Well... I guess a perfect game was a bit too unreasonable...
There goes my perfect game...
On second thought, playing this game maybe wasn't a great idea...
This is way more embarrassing then i thought it would be.
Impressive luck ~winner~... but it'll be my turn to win soon enough.
Eh, I'm still in a fine position, no reason to panic yet.
Okay, I shouldn't be losing this much...
Only so many times I can have such bad luck... right?
You know dealer, I wish you could just stop giving me these awful cards, you're making it too close.
~Player~ you are ruining my stunning victory, I wasn't supposed to lose this much.
OK this is starting to get bad.
How did it go this bad?
It wasn't meant to be like this...
Have I really lost this much? I must be losing touch...
Just letting you all get overconfident.
You think this is gonna continue?
I may be losing now... but I will still win, I don't know how to lose
Don't worry, the irony that I am losing after being so confident is not lost on me.
This is getting ridiculous...
Is this some kind of joke?
This must be rigged right? There is no way I could lose so fast if it was a fair game.
I don't know what's more embarrassing, showing this much skin or losing after being so cocky.
So early?
Well...That was unlucky.
Getting the bad luck out the way early.
What? Why do I get the bad cards so early, give them to ~player~ instead.
These aren't that comfortable anyway.
All right then, don't mind if I do.
I don't know why they make us wear these things, they are too stuffy.
I suppose the smarter thing to do is to take off my socks, but they are cute and this blazer is killing me.
My last defense before the more important items... I had better start winning again.
I honestly didn't expect to get this far... just a bad run of luck i suppose.
This skirt barely covers much anyway, might as well get rid of it.
I suppose my shirt covers up more than the skirt...
Wow... I hadn't even considered that this scenario would happen.
I'm actually getting a little flustered here...
Well I guess you can see them... I can't believe it.
Okay... you can look if you want... but don't get the wrong idea ~player~, I didn't intend for you to see them...
I'm not sure if I'm ready for this to be honest... no, come on Kyou, you can do this.
If you really want to see me that badly...
It's some really bad luck to be revealed first like this... can I even win at this rate?
Good riddance.
Alright, next hand.
One loss, I thought I might lose at least once.
Much more comfortable.
Yeah, it's much comfier without that thing on anyway.
Okay, my bad luck is definitely out of the way now.
Do you like seeing this much skin?
Alright, enough losing, time to win.
You know, I'm not even halfway to defeat yet, think you still have a chance ~player~?
Geez, this is a lot more skin than I thought I would show.
Can't believe I lost this much...(at least ~player~ seems to be enjoying the view.)
This is actually really nerve-wracking... I never thought I would get this flustered.
This is a lot harder than I thought it would be.
I hadn't really considered that I would need to strip this much off.
Well..it's quite revealing but I'm fine with this... not sure about the next layer though.
This is ridiculous, I was supposed to win easily.
Well... here they are, I'm shocked it came to this.
I guess it's my own fault, it is strip poker after all and I should have been more prepared for this.
I only have one option left after this... I don't even want to think about it.
If I punch you in the face you'll forget everything...
Still... don't you think it's a shame to give up on something you've started, no matter what it is? It kind of feels like you lost to yourself, no?
Come on ~player~, you can't be that eager to strip in front of a girl right? You couldn't hold out for a few rounds at least?
So...~target~, where's all that bravado gotten you?
First blood goes to me, get ready for more where that came from.
I've had just about enough of these puns...
These puns are really getting on my nerves now...
Ever gotten this far with a girl around?
Nothing to be shy about here... I'm sure you'll get used to it...
What's the matter ~player~? Isn't this what you wanted to see? Don't get too flustered now...
Just can't focus anymore ~player~ can you... try to control yourself okay?
Another victory for Kyou.
Well of course I won that hand.
Alright ~name~, let's see it.
I wonder what you're going to take off ~name~.
One step closer to victory.
Wow ~name~, it's impressive you could lose with cards like that.
You know, there are far better ways to get naked in front of a girl ~name~, no need to get defeated in poker while you're at it.
Did you really think you could defeat me with those cards?
You tried your best I'm sure... but it still pales in comparison to my own efforts.
I took off something, you can too!
One step closer!
Are you feeling nervous?
Do you enjoy taking stuff off in front of a pretty lady?
Good effort ~name~, but not good enough...
Getting nervous yet ~name~?
You know ~name~, the aim is to get the best hand you can, not pick random cards.
Don't feel bad, it can only get worse from here.
W-Well it's only fair that we both get exposed right?
I hope you aren't getting too excited ~name~.
I can still win this right?
I can still win this!
Of course I didn't lose... I can't lose.
~name~ if you hesitate it just makes things worse... trust me.
A loss for ~name~, I have still got this.
Eager to match me are you? Try not to get too distracted.
Yeah... take it all off.
You can watch me while you strip if you want...
Alright! ~name~ get it off!
I still can't believe that I lost to ~name~.
Thinking of me while you strip ~name~?
Bad luck ~name~, join the losers soon okay?
You could just take it off normally...
Well you're a lot more confident than Nagisa is... maybe you aren't related.
First blood goes to me, get ready for more where that came from.
~name~, you can play an instrument...?
Who's idea was it to play here? The forest is more intimidating than the stripping...
You're pretty far behind, ~name~... think you can stay in much longer?
I've always wanted to try cutting my hair short like yours ~target~... but everyone would just mistake me for my sister Ryou...
Another victory for Kyou.
Well of course I won that hand.
Alright ~name~, let's see it.
I wonder what you're going to take off ~name~.
One step closer to victory.
Wow ~name~, it's impressive you could lose with cards like that.
I'm not too fussed about girls getting changed in front of me... but this feels a lot different.
Did you really think you could defeat me with those cards?
You tried your best I'm sure... but it still pales in comparison to my own efforts.
Alright! ~name~ get it off!
I still can't believe that I lost to ~name~.
You know, seeing ~name~ strip is a lot more pleasing than I imagined it would be.
Bad luck ~name~, join the losers soon okay?
W-Well it's only fair that we both get exposed right?
I wonder if you're feeling as nervous as I was ~name~.
I can still win this right?
I can still win this!
Of course I didn't lose... I can't lose.
~name~ if you hesitate it just makes things worse... trust me.
Wow... this is surprisingly heart racing.
You can watch me while you strip if you want... even thought you're a girl I don't mind.
I took off something, you can too!
One step closer!
Are you feeling nervous?
It's not quite the same as getting changed in front of other girls is it?
Good effort ~name~, but not good enough...
Getting nervous yet ~name~?
You know ~name~, the aim is to get the best hand you can, not pick random cards.
Don't feel bad, it can only get worse from here.
Wait, is it even possible for a tie in poker?
Well... it's impressive that two people can have the exact same hand.
Wow, It's been a while since you stripped ~target~... but your good luck ends here.
First strip of the game... make it a good one, okay?
What's it gonna be ~name~?
Come on ~name~, get it off.
Anytime it's not me just means I'm one step closer to victory.
Is that all you're gonna take off? Lame...
Ha, the loser will suffer the consequences of facing me.
I admire the effort, but of course I still won and now I demand tribute.
You knew it would come to this didn't you?
It is strip poker... you had better be prepared for it.
One step closer until you are all completely exposed.
I came, I saw, I conquered.
Honestly, did you really think you could defeat me?
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~s really cute... but I think I prefer when ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|it's)~ off.
Enough stalling ~name~, take it off.
Come on... that can't be all you're taking off?
If you're going to play strip poker at least remove the boring items before we start...
Alright ~name~, make it something worthwhile...
Alright, things are starting to get real now!
You've gotten me down pretty far, but it's time for me to watch you strip now.
Let's see what you've got ~name~.
Stop stalling and get to the good stuff...
You know, after removing a few of my own layers its starting to get a bit flustering to see others do it too.
Taking off only your ~clothing~... are you that worried about your body ~name~?
What's it gonna be ~name~?
Does anyone think ~name~ is the type to be nervous about this stuff?
That's only a small thing ~name~... where is your sense of adventure?
Don't feel bad ~name~, I already knew you'd have to take it off before we started.
Too easy for me, ~name~ could you try a little harder next round?
You aren't going to remove your ~clothing~ are you...? Boring...
I'm down to this and you still have~clothing.ifPlural(your|a)~ ~clothing~ on?
Well..at least you haven't lost...yet
I know I'm down a lot of layers but I wonder if you have that many layers to go.
Do I make you nervous right now?
Feeling a little flustered stripping in front of a girl with this little clothing?
Honestly, you should have removed everything ages ago but I've been super unlucky.
Did you honestly think you wouldn't need to remove everything, ~name~?
Well, as long as it's not me...
I wonder what he's gonna remove...
That barely covered anything... does that even count?
Haha, time to show us all ~name~.
Can't you be a bit bolder than that? I'm trying my best over here but you aren't making it easy...
~name~ is looking at me... I'm embarrassed but I kinda feel pleased as well.
Well it can't be worse than me right?
Perhaps you like being teased...
Am I getting you all worked up?
well ~name~ you're still in the game and that means there's hope for you...
Some eye candy will do...(Wow he is actually really cute)
It feels weird to be standing here after doing that and yet you are still playing...
Did my show encourage you to lose?
That eager to join me ~name~?
You're a little late to the party ~name~, but better late than never I suppose.
Feeling a little silly playing that game when I was having all the fun?
I hope I didn't distract you too much ~name~... stay focused.
You know, it's a little too late now ~name~, you might as well go for the win.
As long as you're stripping there is still the chance for victory.
Feel free to lose on purpose so you can join me.
Come on, hurry up and get to the good stuff, you're late.
HEY! That's cheating...
If there's another pair under there I think I'm gonna lose it...
~player~ can't concentrate anymore? Is something distracting you?
That desperate to show off in front of a girl were you? Couldn't wait and had to get rid of everything else first.
One step closer...
Get used to it ~name~, more layers are sure to come.
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ pretty cute... shame ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it's)~ gotta go.
Perhaps you wanted to get rid of your ~clothing~ and just lost on purpose...
Don't get too worried ~name~, ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(weren't|wasn't)~ hiding as much as you think.
That's what you wanna take off...? I think something else would be better...
I can already see my victory is just about assured.
It's only something small, not need to get worked up about it.
Your ~clothing~ didn't even cover anything, where's your sense of adventure?
Too nervous to take something larger off hmm?
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ pretty cute... shame ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it's)~ gotta go.
Perhaps you wanted to get rid of your ~clothing~ and just lost on purpose...
Don't get too worried ~name~, ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ wasn't hiding as much as you think.
That's what you wanna take off...? I think something else would be better...
It's only something small, no need to get worked up about it.
Your ~clothing~ didn't even cover anything, where's your sense of adventure?
Too nervous to take something larger off hmm?
Thinking about it now I would encourage the larger items... it's quite thrilling.
I'm not only naked but I have already lost and removing ~clothing~ is the best you can manage?
Is that all? (Wait, why am I disappointed?)
One less item just leaves you one item closer to defeat.
I could do with more luck...
Every item you take off brings me closer to victory... even if it was only something small.
Can we pick the speed up...? Not that I don't enjoy it I just feel a little exposed right now...
What if you lose again, ~name~? Will you harden up and remove something with more substance?
Come on... I could've used something bigger right now...
Well, since you're gonna tease me I'll just tease you too...
Hey! Don't you think it's rude to only remove your ~clothing~ while I'm in the middle of something...?
It's just a blazer Monika... no need to get all fancy with it...
Is she that nervous around guys...? Poor girl...
Strip poker is not usually the kind of game that ends in physical violence anyway...
Just don't try to make me wear any magicians clothes...
I won't tell... maybe
You're supposed to try and remain "hidden" you know...
Wow, It's been a while since you stripped ~target~... but your good luck ends here.
First strip of the game... make it a good one, okay?
What's it gonna be ~name~?
Come on ~name~, get it off.
Anytime it's not me just means I'm one step closer to victory.
Is that all you're gonna take off? Lame...
Ha, the loser will suffer the consequences of facing me.
I admire the effort, but of course I still won and now I demand tribute.
You knew it would come to this didn't you?
It is strip poker... you had better be prepared for it.
One step closer until you are all completely exposed.
I came, I saw, I conquered.
Honestly, did you really think you could defeat me?
~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ really cute... do you think I could borrow ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~?
Enough stalling ~name~, take it off.
Come on... that can't be all you're taking off?
If you're going to play strip poker at least remove the boring items before we start...
Alright ~name~, make it something worthwhile...
Alright, things are starting to get real now!
You've gotten me down pretty far, but it's time for me to watch you strip now.
Let's see what you've got ~name~.
Stop stalling and get to the good stuff...
You know, after removing a few of my own layers its starting to get a bit flustering to see others do it too.
Taking off only your ~clothing~... are you that worried about your body ~name~?
What's it gonna be ~name~?
Does anyone think ~name~ is the type to be nervous about this stuff?
That's only a small thing ~name~... where is your sense of adventure?
Don't feel bad ~name~, I already knew you'd have to take it off before we started.
Too easy for me, ~name~ could you try a little harder next round?
You aren't going to remove your ~clothing~ are you...? Boring...
I'm down to this and you still have~clothing.ifPlural(your|a)~ ~clothing~ on?
Well..at least you haven't lost...yet
I know I'm down a lot of layers but I wonder if you have that many layers to go.
Do I make you nervous right now?
Feeling a little flustered stripping in front of a girl with this little clothing?
Honestly, you should have removed everything ages ago but I've been super unlucky.
Did you honestly think you wouldn't need to remove everything, ~name~?
Well, as long as it's not me...
I wonder what she's gonna remove...
That barely covered anything... does that even count?
Haha, time to show us all ~name~.
Can't you be a bit bolder than that? I'm trying my best over here but you aren't making it easy...
~name~ is looking at me... I'm embarrassed but I kinda feel pleased as well.
Well it can't be worse than me right?
Perhaps you like being teased...
Am I getting you all worked up?
well ~name~ you're still in the game and that means there's hope for you...
Well, at least it's gone now...
It feels weird to be standing here after doing that and yet you are still playing...
Did my show encourage you to lose?
That eager to join me ~name~?
You're a little late to the party ~name~, but better late than never I suppose.
Feeling a little silly playing that game when I was having all the fun?
I hope I didn't distract you too much ~name~... stay focused.
